sentences.en: The dictator refuses to relax his grip on power.
sentences.cn: 独裁者拒绝放松对权力的控制。

sentences.en: The quality of independence is so indispensable for us that parents had better act as a tutor, not a dictator.
sentences.cn: 独立的品质对我们来说是不可或缺的，所以父母最好是做一个家庭教师，而不是独裁者。

sentences.en: He had been a dictator and a warlord who had oppressed and degraded the people of the South.
sentences.cn: 他既是个独裁者，又是位军阀式领袖，压迫侮辱南方人。
